description:
Workflow trigger is an event that causes a workflow to run.

This event will trigger the workflow on a push event.

attributes.name: branches
attributes.description: Select branch name on push event.

description:
Workflow trigger is an event that causes a workflow to run.

This event will trigger the workflow on a pull request event.

attributes.name: types
attributes.description: Run your workflow when an activity on a pull request occurs in the workflow's repository.
